title: Real Madrid's Cristiano Ronaldo uses mobile phone to inspect head injury against Deportivo La Coruna
description: Cristiano Ronaldo suffered a nasty head knock against Deportivo La Coruna on Sunday, but the Real Madrid forward was OK enough to check his injury out on the doctor's mobile phone.
content: The Portugal international did brilliantly to stoop to head home Lucas Vazquez's cross from the edge of the six-yard box, the player's second goal in a convincing 7-1 win for the La Liga champions.However, in scoring the goal at the Santiago Bernabeu, Ronaldo received a hefty kick to the head for his troubles, which left the playmaker with a bloodied face.As Ronaldo left the pitch to receive treatment from the Real doctor, though, he made sure he could see what damage had been done to his face by using the physio's mobile phone.And luckily for the great man, his famed good looks were still in place!Watch the above video to see the incident
